snoopy.blindnote:
2009年6月18日（山元）snoRNABaseより。Homo sapiens U68 snoRNA. This H/ACA box RNA was cloned from a HeLa cells by Ganot et al. (1997b). Its role in guiding pseudouridylation of U4393 in 28S rRNA was evidenced by Ganot et al. (1997a). The pseudouridylation of this residue was previously reported by Ofengand and Bakin (1997).
(20100624末安)UCSCを参考にgenomic positionを変更した,NCBIを参考にしたaccession Noは100%ヒットするものが更にもう1つあったためゲノムと合わせて3つ入れた。を加えた,evidenceはsnoRNAbaseのレファレンスから抜粋。 (20111201吉浜)ホスト遺伝子の塩基配列と構造をRPGを参考に変更しました。
snoopy.evidence: Ganot, P., Bortolin, M. L., and Kiss, T. (1997a). Site-specific pseudouridine formation in preribosomal RNA is guided by small nucleolar RNAs. Cell 89, 799-809, Ofengand, J., and Bakin, A. (1997). Mapping to nucleotide resolution of pseudouridine residues in large subunit ribosomal RNAs from representative eukaryotes, prokaryotes, archaebacteria, mitochondria and chloroplasts. J Mol Biol 266, 246-268, Ganot, P., Caizergues-Ferrer, M., and Kiss, T. (1997b). The family of box ACA small nucleolar RNAs is defined by an evolutionarily conserved secondary structure and ubiquitous sequence elements essential for RNA accumulation. Genes Dev 11, 941-956.
